# Module: tf.contrib.recurrent



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/recurrent/python/recurrent_api.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.9/tensorflow/contrib/recurrent/python/recurrent_api.py).

Recurrent computations library.

## Functions

[`Recurrent(...)`](../../tf/contrib/recurrent/Recurrent): Compute a recurrent neural net.

[`bidirectional_functional_rnn(...)`](../../tf/contrib/recurrent/bidirectional_functional_rnn): Creates a bidirectional recurrent neural network.

[`functional_rnn(...)`](../../tf/contrib/recurrent/functional_rnn): Same interface as <a href="../../tf/nn/dynamic_rnn"><code>tf.nn.dynamic_rnn</code></a>.
